text: Joakim Simon Noah (born February 25, 1985) is an American former professional basketball player for the Chicago Bulls. He started his basketball career in 2004 and retired in 2020. He also played in his high school basketball teams at the United Nations International School, at Poly Prep Country Day School, and at The Lawrenceville School. Noah is 6 feet and 11 inches. During his NBA career, he played for the Chicago Bulls, New York Knicks, Memphis Grizzlies, and Los Angeles Clippers. Noah was born on February 25, 1985 in New York City, New York to a French father and to a Swedish mother. Noah played for the French national team. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:French basketball players Category:Los Angeles Clippers players Category:Memphis Grizzlies players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Sportspeople from Florida Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Sportspeople from Paris
title: Joakim Noah
